ability.Wonder Guard: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.
ability.Corrosion: This Pokemon can poison or badly poison a Pokemon regardless of its types.

Thousand Arrows.effect: This move can hit airborne Pokemon, which includes Flying-type Pokemon.

Substitute.effect: The user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP and sets a substitute with the same amount of HP to take damage from attacks for it. The substitute is removed once enough damage (1/4 of max HP) is inflicted. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining, or if it already has a substitute.

Protect.effect: The user is protected from attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. Fails if the user uses this move last turn.
